title: Episode 22 Review: OnePiece Anime
author: Tayyab Ali
description: A detailed review of One Piece Episode 22, discussing the arrival of Don Krieg at the Baratie and the moral dilemmas presented in the episode.

title: One Piece Watchers: The Baratie Arc with Macy
author: One Piece Watchers
description: Discussion of the Baratie Arc including Episode 22 and the introduction of Don Krieg as a major antagonist.

title: Baratie Arc - One Piece Review
author: Gold Giant Podcast
description: A comprehensive review of the Baratie Arc, covering Sanji's introduction, the battle with Don Krieg's armada, and Zoro's confrontation with Mihawk.

title: Episode 22 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 22 including plot summary, character appearances, production details, and trivia.

title: Journey into the World of Pirates: Baratie Arc
author: AnimeTipz
description: An analysis of the Baratie Arc's themes and character development, including Sanji's philosophy and Don Krieg's role as an antagonist.

title: 25 Years Later, One Piece's Anime Reveals the Fate of One of the Oldest Villains
author: ComicBook.com
description: Article discussing the recent return of Don Krieg and Gin in One Piece Episode 1150, over 25 years after their debut in Episode 22.

title: Netflix's One Piece Made the Right Call Writing Out East Blue's Most Forgettable Villain
author: CBR
description: Editorial discussing the Netflix live-action adaptation's decision to minimize Don Krieg's role, contrasting the anime version from Episode 22.
